name: Basketball Game - "NBA Player Steph Curry edition"
name_original: Basketball Game - "NBA Player Steph Curry edition"
description:
Practice your shooting skills in this game with the best shooter in the world - Steph Curry as a theme!

* Make it - Get 1 point
* Swish it - Get 2 points

Collect points to unlock new levels.
Who is the best distance shooter? Compare scores with your friends worldwide.
